other_title: Saredo Tsumibito wa Ryū to Odoru (Japanese)
Saredo Tsumibito wa Ryū to Odoru: Dances with the Dragons (Japanese)
されど罪人は竜と踊る (Japanese)
plot: Gayus and the beautiful but cruel sword-wielder Gigina are "special equationists," individuals that manipulate the equations that govern world's laws thus allowing fantastic and deadly results. These two bounty hunters are caught up in a battle with dragons in the city of Eridana and in the intrigue of great nations.
